00147 /*---- CPU specific items ------------------------------------------*/
00148 
00149 /* default flags */
00150 #define USE_WATCHDOG
00151 #undef  LCD_SUPPORT
00152 #undef  LCD_DEBUG      // debug output on LCD
00153 #define EEPROM_SUPPORT
00154 
00155 /*--------------------------------*/
00156 #if defined(SCS_210)
00157 #include <c8051F020.h>
00158 #define CPU_C8051F020
00159 #define CPU_CYGNAL
00160 
00161 #define LED_0 P3 ^ 4
00162 #define LED_1 P3 ^ 3
00163 #define LED_ON 0
00164 sbit RS485_ENABLE = P3 ^ 5;
00165 
00166 /*--------------------------------*/
00167 #elif defined(SUBM_250)
00168 #include "c8051F320.h" // don't use the one from Keil !!
00169 #define CPU_C8051F320
00170 #define CPU_CYGNAL
00171 
00172 #define LED_0 P1 ^ 2
00173 #define LED_1 P1 ^ 3
00174 #define LED_ON 0
00175 sbit RS485_ENABLE = P1 ^ 0;
00176 
00177 #undef EEPROM_SUPPORT
00178 
00179 /*--------------------------------*/
00180 #elif defined(SCS_300) || defined(SCS_310)
00181 #include <c8051F020.h>
00182 #define CPU_C8051F020
00183 #define CPU_CYGNAL
00184 
00185 #define LED_0 P3 ^ 3
00186 #define LED_1 P3 ^ 4
00187 #define LED_ON 0
00188 sbit RS485_ENABLE = P3 ^ 5;
00189 
00190 /*--------------------------------*/
00191 #elif defined(SUBM_300)
00192 #include <c8051F020.h>
00193 #define CPU_C8051F020
00194 #define CPU_CYGNAL
00195 
00196 #define LED_0 P3 ^ 3
00197 #define LED_1 P3 ^ 4
00198 #define LED_ON 0
00199 sbit RS485_ENABLE = P3 ^ 5;
00200 
00201 #undef EEPROM_SUPPORT
00202 
00203 /*--------------------------------*/
00204 #elif defined(SCS_400) || defined(SCS_500)
00205 #include <c8051F000.h>
00206 #define CPU_C8051F000
00207 #define CPU_CYGNAL
00208 
00209 #define LED_0 P3 ^ 4
00210 #define LED_ON 1
00211 sbit RS485_ENABLE = P3 ^ 5;
00212 
00213 /*--------------------------------*/
00214 #elif defined(SCS_520) || defined(SCS_600) || defined(SCS_700) || defined (SCS_800) || defined (SCS_900) || defined (SCS_910)
00215 #include <c8051F000.h>
00216 #define CPU_C8051F000
00217 #define CPU_CYGNAL
00218 
00219 #define LED_0 P3 ^ 4
00220 #define LED_ON 0
00221 sbit RS485_ENABLE = P3 ^ 5;
00222 
00223 /*--------------------------------*/
00224 #elif defined(SCS_1000)
00225 #include <c8051F120.h>
00226 #define CPU_C8051F120
00227 #define CPU_CYGNAL
00228 
00229 #define LED_0 P2 ^ 0
00230 #define LED_1 P0 ^ 6
00231 #define LED_2 P0 ^ 7 // buzzer
00232 #define LED_ON 1     // will be zero when 2981 will be used instead of 2982
00233 sbit RS485_ENABLE = P0 ^ 5;
00234 sbit RS485_SEC_ENABLE = P0 ^ 4;
00235 
00236 #undef USE_WATCHDOG
00237 #define LCD_SUPPORT
00238 
00239 /*--------------------------------*/
00240 #elif defined(HVR_300)
00241 #include <aduc812.h>
00242 #define CPU_ADUC812
00243 
00244 #define LED_0 P3 ^ 4
00245 #define LED_ON 1
00246 sbit RS485_ENABLE = P3 ^ 5;
00247 
00248 /*--------------------------------*/
00249 #elif defined(HVR_200)
00250 #include <c8051F310.h>
00251 #define CPU_C8051F310
00252 #define CPU_CYGNAL
00253 
00254 #define LED_0 P2 ^ 4
00255 #define LED_1 P2 ^ 5 
00256 #define LED_2 P2 ^ 6 
00257 #define LED_3 P2 ^ 7
00258 #define LED_ON 1
00259 sbit RS485_ENABLE = P0 ^ 7;
00260 
00261 /*--------------------------------*/
00262 #else
00263 #error Please define SCS_xxx or HVR_xxx in project options
00264 #endif
00265 
00266 #define LED_OFF !LED_ON
00267 
00268 #if defined(LED_4)
00269 #define N_LED 5
00270 #elif defined(LED_3)
00271 #define N_LED 4
00272 #elif defined(LED_2)
00273 #define N_LED 3
00274 #elif defined(LED_1)
00275 #define N_LED 2
00276 #elif defined(LED_0)
00277 #define N_LED 1
00278 #else
00279 #define N_LED 0
00280 #endif
00281        
00282 /* map SBUF0 & Co. to SBUF */
00283 #if !defined(CPU_C8051F020) && !defined(CPU_C8051F120) && !defined(CPU_C8051F310) && !defined(CPU_C8051F320)
00284 #define SCON0    SCON
00285 #define SBUF0    SBUF
00286 #define TI0      TI
00287 #define RI0      RI
00288 #define RB80     RB8
00289 #define ES0      ES
00290 #define PS0      PS
00291 #endif
00292 
00293 #if defined(CPU_C8051F020) || defined(CPU_C8051F120)
00294 #define PS0      PS
00295 #endif
00296 
00297 #if defined(CPU_C8051F310) || defined(CPU_C8051F320)
00298 #define EEPROM_OFFSET 0x3A00 // 0x3A00-0x3DFF = 1024 bytes
00299 #else
00300 #define EEPROM_OFFSET 0x8000
00301 #endif
00302 
00303 /*---- MSCB commands -----------------------------------------------*/
00304 
00305 #define VERSION 0x17            // version 1.7
00306 
00307 /* Version history:
00308 
00309 1.0 Initial
00310 1.1 Add unit prefix, implement upgrade command
00311 1.2 Add CMD_ECHO, CMD_READ with multiple channels
00312 1.3 Add "set node name"
00313 1.4 Remove CMD_xxxs_CONF
00314 1.5 Return 0x0A for protected pages on upload
00315 1.6 Upload subpages of 60 bytes with ACK
00316 1.7 Upload with simplified CRC code
00317 */
00318 
00319 #define CMD_ADDR_NODE8  0x09
00320 #define CMD_ADDR_NODE16 0x0A
00321 #define CMD_ADDR_BC     0x10
00322 #define CMD_ADDR_GRP8   0x11
00323 #define CMD_ADDR_GRP16  0x12
00324 #define CMD_PING8       0x19
00325 #define CMD_PING16      0x1A
00326 
00327 #define CMD_INIT        0x20
00328 #define CMD_GET_INFO    0x28
00329 #define CMD_SET_ADDR    0x34
00330 #define CMD_SET_BAUD    0x39
00331 
00332 #define CMD_FREEZE      0x41
00333 #define CMD_SYNC        0x49
00334 #define CMD_UPGRADE     0x50
00335 #define CMD_USER        0x58
00336 
00337 #define CMD_ECHO        0x61
00338 #define CMD_TOKEN       0x68
00339 #define CMD_SET_FLAGS   0x69
00340 
00341 #define CMD_ACK         0x78
00342 
00343 #define CMD_WRITE_NA    0x80
00344 #define CMD_WRITE_ACK   0x88
00345 
00346 #define CMD_FLASH       0x98
00347 
00348 #define CMD_READ        0xA0
00349 
00350 #define CMD_WRITE_BLOCK 0xB5
00351 #define CMD_READ_BLOCK  0xB9
00352 
00353 #define GET_INFO_GENERAL   0
00354 #define GET_INFO_VARIABLES 1
00355 
00356 /*---- flags from the configuration and status register (CSR) ------*/
00357 
00358 #define CSR_DEBUG       (1<<0)
00359 #define CSR_LCD_PRESENT (1<<1)
00360 #define CSR_SYNC_MODE   (1<<2)
00361 #define CSR_FREEZE_MODE (1<<3)
00362 #define CSR_WD_RESET    (1<<2)
00363 
00364 /*---- baud rates used ---------------------------------------------*/
00365 
00366 #define BD_9600            1
00367 #define BD_19200           2
00368 #define BD_28800           3
00369 #define BD_57600           4
00370 #define BD_115200          5
00371 #define BD_172800          6
00372 #define BD_345600          7

00374 /*---- info structures ---------------------------------------------*/
00375 
00376 typedef struct {
00377    unsigned char protocol_version;
00378    unsigned char node_status;
00379    unsigned char n_variables;
00380    unsigned short node_address;
00381    unsigned short group_address;
00382    unsigned short watchdog_resets;
00383    char node_name[16];
00384 } MSCB_INFO;
00385 
00386 typedef struct {
00387    unsigned char width;         // width in bytes
00388    unsigned char unit;          // physical units UNIT_xxxx
00389    unsigned char prefix;        // unit prefix PRFX_xxx
00390    unsigned char status;        // status (not yet used)
00391    unsigned char flags;         // flags MSCBF_xxx
00392    char name[8];                // name
00393    void *ud;                    // point to user data buffer
00394 
00395 #ifdef SCS_1000
00396    float min, max, delta;       // limits for button control
00397    unsigned short node_address; // address for remote node on subbus
00398    unsigned char  channel;      // address for remote channel subbus
00399 #endif
00400 } MSCB_INFO_VAR;
00401 
00402 #define MSCBF_FLOAT    (1<<0)   // channel in floating point format
00403 #define MSCBF_SIGNED   (1<<1)   // channel is signed integer
00404 #define MSCBF_DATALESS (1<<2)   // channel doesn't contain data
00405 #define MSCBF_HIDDEN   (1<<3)   // used for internal config parameters
00406 #define MSCBF_REMIN    (1<<4)   // get variable from remote node on subbus
00407 #define MSCBF_REMOUT   (1<<5)   // send variable to remote node on subbus
00408 
00409 /* physical units */
00410 
00411 #define PRFX_PICO       -12
00412 #define PRFX_NANO        -9
00413 #define PRFX_MICRO       -6
00414 #define PRFX_MILLI       -3
00415 #define PRFX_NONE         0
00416 #define PRFX_KILO         3
00417 #define PRFX_MEGA         6
00418 #define PRFX_GIGA         9
00419 #define PRFX_TERA        12
00420 
00421 #define UNIT_UNDEFINED    0
00422

00425 #define UNIT_GRAM         2
00426 #define UNIT_SECOND       3
00427 #define UNIT_MINUTE       4
00428 #define UNIT_HOUR         5
00429 #define UNIT_AMPERE       6
00430 #define UNIT_KELVIN       7
00431 #define UNIT_CELSIUS      8
00432 #define UNIT_FARENHEIT    9
00433

00439 #define UNIT_WATT        23

00441 #define UNIT_OHM         25
00442 #define UNIT_TESLA       26
00443 #define UNIT_LITERPERSEC 27
00444 #define UNIT_RPM         28
00445 #define UNIT_FARAD       29
00446 
00447 // computer units
00448

00450 #define UNIT_BYTE        52
00451 #define UNIT_WORD        53
00452 #define UNIT_DWORD       54
00453 #define UNIT_ASCII       55
00454 #define UNIT_STRING      56
00455 #define UNIT_BAUD        57
00456 
00457 // others
00458

00460 #define UNIT_PPM         91
00461 #define UNIT_COUNT       92
00462 #define UNIT_FACTOR      93

00466 typedef struct {                // system info stored in EEPROM
00467    unsigned int node_addr;
00468    unsigned int group_addr;
00469    unsigned int wd_counter;
00470    char node_name[16];
00471 } SYS_INFO;
